content: **pattern notes** * finished measurements scarf measures approximately 68 /172 5 cm long x 9 1/2 /24 cm wide after blocking * gauge one motif = 4 1/2 /11 5 cm before blocking * stitches used chain chain single crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip st >note from designer this pattern is no longer available on the caron website i have been given written permission to post the pdfs of my free caron patterns on ravelry
